abstract: Calculates the discrete double-precision Fourier transform for a vector.

declaration.code: void vDSP_DFT_ExecuteD(const struct vDSP_DFT_SetupStructD * __Setup, const double * __Ir, const double * __Ii, double * __Or, double * __Oi);

overview:
## Discussion

This function uses the following operation for a real transform. That is, when the [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_DFT_zrop_CreateSetupD] function provides the setup structure:

The function uses the following operation for a complex transform. That is, when the [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_DFT_zop_CreateSetupD] function provides the setup structure:

This function supports in-place operation where the `Or` and `Ir` parameters are equal, and the `Oi` and `Ii` parameters are equal. The transform length must equal the transform length specified in the given setup structure.

items.description: Calculates the discrete single-precision Fourier transform for a vector.
items.name: vDSP_DFT_Execute

sections.title: Functions to perform discrete Fourier transforms

title: vDSP_DFT_ExecuteD
